btnOkAction

public void btnOkAction()
Checks data entered and submit it if correct.

checkAndSubmitData

public boolean checkAndSubmitData()
Checks the validity of entered Rat Number & Group name. if the Rat Number already exists, it asks for confirmation; if the Group name is not valid, error message is displayed; if all data are correct, we start tracking activity.

Returns:
true: success

isValidRatEntered

public boolean isValidRatEntered()
Checks if a valid rat/group has been selected.

Returns:
true: valid rat, false: invalid rat or user hasn't selected a rat

cancelAction

public void cancelAction()
Action taken when the cancel button is pressed.

isCancelled

public boolean isCancelled()
Checks if the user has canceled the RatInfoForm.

Returns:
true: user has canceled the form, false: user hasn't cancel the form
